description: This Dart source file defines an AppTheme class that provides customized theme data for a Flutter application. It specifies color palettes, text styles, and theming for various UI components like AppBar, Card, Buttons, InputDecoration, Divider, and Chip, supporting Material 3 design specifications.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class that provides a static method to generate a customized light theme for a Flutter app using Material 3 design principles.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Generates and returns a ThemeData object configured with specific color schemes, text styles, and component themes for the light theme variant.
